Heatmap group data for heatmap_group function.

Source: R/heatmap_group_data.R
heatmap_group_data.Rd

Heatmap group data for heatmap_group function.

Usage

data(heatmap_group_data)

Format

Dataframe: include level1 columns (Groups, Group1, Group2, ...), level2 columns (GeneID, Sample1, Sample2, ...).

References

https://github.com/BioSciTools/BioSciToolsDatasets/tree/main/Heatmap/

Author

benben-miao

Examples

# 1. Library TOmicsVis package
library(TOmicsVis)

# 2. Load example data
data(heatmap_group_data)

# 3. View example data
heatmap_group_data
#>                 V2          V3          V4          V5          V6          V7
